His younger brother, due to the vicissitudes of the times and to his own laziness, dissipated his own fortune and afterwards became a peddler of writing materials. japanese: うわべだけの知識だけじゃなく、本物の実力を身につける必要があります。
english: You have to acquire real skills, not just superficial knowledge.

japanese: 算数教育が非常に大事だと痛切に感じていた。
english: I was acutely aware of how very important mathematical education was.

japanese: 石田盗塁で３塁に進む。
english: Ishida advances to third on a stolen base.

japanese: いつの日か世界人口の大多数がエスペラントを話すようになる、というような話を私は信じない。
english: I don't believe that some day a majority of the world's population will speak Esperanto.

japanese: この話は果てしない宇宙の中の旅です。
english: This tale is a trip through infinite space.

japanese: 暗闇から急に現れた犬にとてもビックリしました。
english: I was shocked by the dog that sprang out of the darkness.

japanese: 彼は愛想のいい奴だが気軽に踏み込ませない一線を持っていた。
english: He was an amiable fellow, but had a certain reserve that he would not let you casually trespass upon.

japanese: わぁ、たまねぎ味のベーグルだ。
english: Oh, onion bagels.

japanese: わたしたちは、モーセが律法に記し、預言者たちも書いている方に出会った。それはナザレの人で、ヨセフの子イエスだ。
english: We have found him of whom Moses in the law and also the prophets wrote, Jesus of Nazareth, the son of Joseph.

japanese: ところでね、死んだらそれで終わりと思う？
english: By the way, do you think that when you die that's it?

japanese: どう？来ない？
english: Well? Will you come?

japanese: 「俺の携帯見なかったか？」「テーブルの上よ」
english: "Seen my cell phone?" "On the table!"

japanese: あの雲、ウサギみたい。
english: That cloud looks like a rabbit to me.

japanese: 従業員は払い戻しに応じなかった。そこで私は社長を出すよう求めた。
english: The clerk refused to give me a refund at which point I demanded to see the manager.

japanese: 雪に包まれた金閣の美しさは、比べるものがなかった。
english: The beauty of the Golden Pavilion covered in snow was unmatched.

japanese: 試合に負けた。
english: I lost the game.

japanese: ゲームで負けた。
english: I lost the game.

japanese: 君の負けだね。
english: You lost the game.

japanese: 部屋から出てちょうだい。
english: Leave the room.

japanese: 石油を輸送する船は、オイルタンカーと呼ばれています。
english: A ship that transports oil is called an oil tanker.

japanese: 安いね。
english: That's cheap, isn't it?

japanese: こんなきれいな夕陽見たことないよ。
english: I've never seen such a beautiful sunset.

japanese: このテレビドラマの警官は職権を乱用する汚職警官みたいです。
english: It seems that the policeman in this TV series is a dirty cop who abuses his authority.

japanese: シャオワンは北京に着きました。
english: Xiao Wang arrived in Beijing.

japanese: それは良いニュースなのか？
english: Is it good news?

japanese: 今日も氷点下です。
english: Even today, the temperature is below zero.

japanese: 今日も氷点を下っております。
english: Even today, the temperature is below zero.

japanese: 今日も気温は零度を下回っています。
english: Even today, the temperature is below zero.

japanese: 今日もまだ氷点下だ。
english: Even today, the temperature is below zero.
